description: Retrieves information about a model copy job. For more information, see Copy models to be used in other regions in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: jobArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model copy job.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model copy job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the model copy job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the model copy job was created.

nested_items.name: targetModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the copied model.

nested_items.name: targetModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the copied model.

nested_items.name: sourceAccountId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the account that the model being copied originated from.

nested_items.name: sourceModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the original model being copied.

nested_items.name: targetModelKmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the KMS key encrypting the copied model.

nested_items.name: targetModelTags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the copied model.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: An error message for why the model copy job failed.

nested_items.name: sourceModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the original model being copied.
